Conceptual labor is the experience of doing work that redefines itself as you do it.

Conceptual Labor

Conceptual Labor

Conceptual labor is the experience of doing work that redefines itself as you do it.

This website contains the Theory of Conceptual Labor, the full text of the book Conceptual Labor, and a blog where supplemental essays, links, and events will be posted infrequenly but regularly.

Readers new to the Theory of Conceptual Labor should begin with the introduction.
